div.p: This field indicates whether or not the drug is covered by Medicare Part D. The Part D benefit does not cover all FDA-approved drugs. However, plan sponsors can offer an “enhanced” benefit package that covers non-Part D drugs, such as over-the-counter medications. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/drugcvrgstus_cd
